original_text: When you arrive in a town or a village, look for a good person there. Continue to stay in that person's house until you leave there.
korean_text: 어떤 성이나 마을에 들어가든지 그 중에 합당한 자를 찾아내어 너희가 떠나기까지 거기서 머물라

sentences.original_text: When you arrive in a town or a village
look for a good person there
Continue to stay in that person's house
